result.execSummary:
The defendant Kevin M. Green was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kevin M. Green is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kevin M. Green was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Consecutive to: to any other sentence

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kevin M. Green in court with attorney Jay M. Englund.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State states status/matters are resolved.  13CF336 parties are in agreement to revocation of DPA and both matters are resolved.  Atty Englund states recs.  NC plea entered to Ct 1 in 14CF234.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on plea/accepts/finds guilty.  Atty Englund makes statement on behalf of DE.  Court admonishes DE and sentences.

13CF336 - DP revoked
Ct 1:  $543.00 costs/fines/surcharges to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan

14CF234
Ct 1:  amended to Misd. Bailjumping - NC
Fine/costs/surcharges of $579.00 to be paid w/in 60 days or set up payment plan
90 days jail w/huber consecutive to any other sentence
To commence on or before 11/28/2014 at 6:30 pm
EMP approved per jail rules
3 days sentence credit to be applied
Cash bond to be applied
Ct 2:  Dismissed
Ct 3:  Dismissed
Return date on September 30, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Return date on August 28, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Bond continues.  Defendant agrees with waiver of time limits.  Bond continues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 15, 2014 at 09:00 am.  Return date scheduled for August 28, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 22, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 25, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Kevin M. Green in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE is going to hire atty.  (Jay Englund).  Meeting with atty. Thursday.  Bond continues.  Court resets matter  Return date scheduled for July 25, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
No contact with MAB, premises, residence or employment.  Absolute sobriety at all times, no taverns or liq stores.

Defendant Kevin M. Green in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State request cash bail continues with no contact with MAB, premises, residence and employment.  Advised rights to an attorney. Preliminary hearing issue not addressed due to defendant requesting to seek counsel.  Cash bond continues with  Special bond conditions as follows:  No contact with M.A.B. her residence, premises and her employment.   Absolute sobriety at all times.  No entry into bars, taverns or premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.  Return date scheduled for July 8, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
